name: buybinds
description: CS GO buy binds keyboard mapper

scripts.dev: watchify --poll=25 -v -d -t scssify -t [babelify --presets [env react] --sourceMapsAbsolute --only src] src/index.jsx -o dist/bundle.js --extension=.jsx
scripts.start: browserify -t scssify -t [babelify --presets [env react] --only src] -g [ uglifyify --mangle --compress [ --sequences --dead_code --booleans ] ] src/index.jsx -o dist/bundle.js --extension=.jsx

author: nksfrank
